extendedInfo.description: LiveScore football tennis - US Open tennis 2013 scoreboard - US Open tennis 2013 scoreboard ATPLive timing Formula - unofficial app. UEFA Champions League live - Livescore live score free score centre live score application with following sports: - Football - Basketball - Ice hockey - Tennis- Handball- Baseball- Live timing Formula- Rugby- American Football - Volleyball US Open tennis 2013 scoreboardFEATURES:- Super fast PUSH notifications for all matches added to "My games"- streaming bandwidth friendly (minimal data transfers stream)- live score alert mode choice (notification, vibration, custom sound)- auto refresh stream (refresh interval from 15 sec to 5 minutes)- change date and browse for fixtures (up to 1 year) or finished matches from 1 January 2011- EPL Barclays England Premier League live scores and results with live commentaries for Aston Villa, Manchester City, Newcastle United, Wigan, Chelsea, Norwich, Everton, Liverpool, Manchester United, Southampton, Stoke, Sunderland, Swansea, Tottenham, West Ham, Arsenal, Fulham, Queens Park Rangers QPR, Reading, West Bromwich Albion WBA- clean and simple mobile live score design- all leagues sorted by priority + Leagues live score filter- live score support powered by Crittercism- NBA 2k13 live NBA 2013 results (live score)- live scores centre nfl- UEFA Champions League 2013El Clasico 2012 Supercup Barcelona (Barca) Real Madrid live score.TV streaming: GolTV (USA - reviews.title: trick
reviews.comment: all this does is tells you they have changed the brand name and don\'t work until you\'ve downloaded sofascores! what\'s the point in updating an app for it just to direct you to download another app? absolute waste of time, don\'t bother downloading it cuz it don\'t do anything unless you download sofascore which don\'t cover all football games either may I add!
reviews.author: Jason Yates

reviews.title: Poor App
reviews.comment: I have no idwa why this app even exists on play store. All it does is to redirect you to another app and nothing else. Its not even able to find any info or details for events scheduled for now. Wish I could give zero rating!
reviews.author: Ravi K Singh

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I lose sleep watching tennis ALL YEAR LONG! :-) LOL

reviews.title: EU live score
reviews.comment: Great if yr a sport crazy person. It updates you with the score e.t.c. Was vry useful when the game isnt on the basic channels on the t.v.
